title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7823.4 - Average fuel economy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7823.4 - Average fuel economy

State Regulations

For fiscal years beginning April 1, 1981 and each April
first thereafter, the average fuel economy shall be as follows: Fiscal year

Average fuel
economy
1981-82
24.0 miles per gallon (mpg)
1982-1983
26.0 miles per gallon (mpg)
1983-1984
27.0 miles per gallon (mpg)
1984 and thereafter
27.5 miles per gallon (mpg)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7823.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
